document.title: Diagram toolbar
document.paragraph:
The customizable toolbar of the diagram contains these buttons by default:
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_center_diagram_color.gif Target to cluster or class Drop a class or a cluster on this icon to build the corresponding diagram.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_new_inherit_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/30_managing_links/10_new_inheritance_link.xml Create new inheritance links
Selecting this button allows you to create inheritance, client-supplier or aggregate links by picking from one class and dropping on the other.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_new_class_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/20_altering_the_system/10_new_class.xml Create a new class
Pick from this button and drop on the diagram to add a new class.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_undo_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/15_history.xml Undo last action
Click to undo the last action.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_cmd_history_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/15_history.xml History tool
Click to open the History tool.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_redo_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/15_history.xml Redo last action
Click to redo the last undone action.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_recycle_bin_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/40_modifying_the_display/30_remove_from_view.xml Remove figure
Drop figures in this hole that you want to remove from the view only.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_color_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/40_modifying_the_display/40_change_color.xml Change color
Drop class bubbles in this hole to change their color, or click this button and change the color of all class bubbles at once.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_class_header_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/20_altering_the_system/30_class_header.xml Change class name and generics
Drop class bubbles in this hole if you want to change a name and/or formal generics.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_fill_cluster_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/40_modifying_the_display/60_retrieve_all.xml Include all classes of cluster
Drop a cluster in this hole to show all classes of the cluster in this view.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_select_depth_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/40_modifying_the_display/20_select_depth.xml Select depth of relations
Click to bring up the Select depth dialog.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_zoom_out_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/40_modifying_the_display/50_zooming.xml Zoom out
Shrink the diagram.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_zoom_fit_to_screen_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/40_modifying_the_display/50_zooming.xml Fit Diagram to Screen
Fit the diagram to the screen dimensions so it is all visible.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_zoom_in_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/40_modifying_the_display/50_zooming.xml Zoom in
Enlarge the diagram.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_inherit_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/40_modifying_the_display/10_show_hide.xml Show/hide inheritance links
Toggle visibility of all inheritance links in the view.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_supplier_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/40_modifying_the_display/10_show_hide.xml Show/hide client-supplier links
Toggle visibility of all client-supplier links in the view.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_display_labels_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/40_modifying_the_display/10_show_hide.xml Show/hide labels
Toggle visibility of all client link labels in the view.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_export_to_png_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/60_to_image.xml Export diagram to.png
Click to generate a .png file from current view.
The toolbar may also be configured to contain these buttons:
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_toggle_quality_color.png
Toggles the drawing quality.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_toggle_force_color.png
Toggles the physics mode on and off.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_uml_color.png
Toggles view between BON notation and UML.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_remove_anchor_color.png
Allows to anchor or unanchor a class/cluster figure.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_physics_settings_color.png
Displays physics settings dialog to control physics behavour.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_delete_small_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/20_altering_the_system/40_remove_from_system.xml Delete
Drop items in this hole to remove them from the system.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_display_legend_color.gif
Toggle cluster color legend.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_display_cluster_color.gif
Toggle cluster boundaries to and from view.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_straight_arrows_color.gif
../../how_to_s/60_designing_a_project/30_managing_links/40_link_tool.xml Put handles on a link
Click on this button to toggle right angles on all links in the view. Drop a link on it to bring up the link tool for that link.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_super_cluster_color.gif Target to enclosing cluster Re-centers the diagram on the parent cluster.
In addition to these toolbar buttons there is also a drop down list for selecting various zoom percentages on the current view, and a view list for switching between previously saved views/layouts of various parts of the system.
